<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Obtener metadatos de un grupo"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/group/metadata"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retorna los metadatos detallados de un grupo específico.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["groupJid"],"properties":{"groupJid":{"type":"string","description":"ID del grupo (JID).","example":"120363404495022854@g.us"}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Metadatos del grupo.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"type":"string"},"subject":{"type":"string"},"desc":{"type":"string"},"participants":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"type":"string","description":"ID del participante."}},"title":"Participant"}}},"title":"GroupMetadata"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
